external_games.name: Mystic Destinies: Serendipity of Aeons - Takumi Epilogue

name: Mystic Destinies: Serendipity of Aeons - Takumi Epilogue
summary: Several months after you solved a years-long case, you and Takumi are still working as partners on dangerous missions. With Valentine's Day coming up, you both resolve to try and relax for once and go on a proper date.
